item.description:
Advance tickets are needed! Please use:
http://www.brownpapertickets.com/event/308268

It's time for one of the most popular traditions of BVS and the local healthy living and natural foods and vegetarian communities -- the New Year's Day Banquet at Grasshopper (Asian restaurant)!

We will have a generous banquet of soup, salad, five appetizers, six entrees, and dessert -- for a bargain price of $14.25 plus tax and tip. See the menu below.

Advance tickets are needed! Please use:
http://www.brownpapertickets.com/event/308268


NEW YEAR'S DAY DINNERS (2 seatings)
Tuesday, January 1, 2013
12:30 pm
3:00 pm

We will be served 'family style' at friendly tables of 8, so don't hesitate to arrive alone! As tables of 8 fill up, they will be served. This is not a buffet.

$14.25 per person
plus tax (7% in Boston) and 15% tip = $17.50

Children: 6 - 12 years old are half price. 5 years and under are free.


~~~ MENU ~~~

** No animal ingredients **

Vietnamese Salad -- finely shredded raw cabbage, carrots, daikon, and celery with tofu, in a light sweet/sour dressing, topped with chopped peanuts

Nori Rolls - Sticky rice with shredded carrot and daicon, avocado, wrapped in thin paper of sea vegetable, with pickled ginger and wasabe

Japanese Buckwheat Noodles -- with peanut sauce and sesame seeds

Vermicelli Hand Rolls -- elegantly wrapped in rice sheet, with dipping sauce

Fried Yellow Bean Cakes -- crispy and very delicious

Steamed Dumplings filled with mixed vegetables, napa, and tofu, with ginger dipping sauce

Cup of Soup -- Choice of either:
Spicy Hot and Sour Soup
Wonton Soup

Curry Coconut Vermicelli Noodles with Sweet Potatoes

Hang's Kale, Tofu & Seitan Supreme --
Steamed kale, topped with steamed tofu scallions and seitan, red peppers in black bean basil sauce

Grasshopper Supreme --
Skinless eggplant served with asparagus, spinach, and portabello mushroom in chili basil sauce

Sweet and Sour Sensation & No Name Mix --
Sweet and Sour Battered Tofu & Seitan served with broccoli and sesame seeds

House Special Crispy Taro Nest
Three Mushrooms, Broccoli, and Mixed Vegetables with vegetable oyster sauce served in a delicious, edible taro basket

Tofu Eggplant Surprise
Fresh asparagus and eggplant with steamed tofu chunks and peppers in a mild spicy black bean sauce

Brown Rice

Dessert: Fresh Melons - cubes of freshly cut cantaloupe, honeydew, watermelon

Jasmine Tea and Brita Purified Water


ALL ARE WELCOME

Info: 617-424-8846 BVS
617-254-8883 Grasshopper


Location:
Grasshopper (an all-vegan restaurant)
1 North Beacon St., Allston MA 02134
617-254-8883

Busses # 66, 57, and 64 stop there. Closest subway stop is Allston St. on the Green Line B trolley (Comm. Ave.)
Free street parking; allow time to find a spot.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: 3:00 pm New Year's Day Dinner at Grasshopper, Asian Restaurant, Allston
